page.title: 12Gweek Sports Club Continued
page.content: and wear yellow shirts and blue shorts, the second team wear blue shirts and yellow shorts. To raise money to build the club house,they organised car boot sales and other similar events,but the main event was a sponsered bike ride from Gweek to Exeter.Mr.Burnett supplied a bike and they rode in relay to Exeter city football club where the manager of Exeter city came out to sign their sponser forms. There are nine members of the commitee and approximately two hundred members. In the future they have plans to build bigger changing rooms and we hope everything will go well for the Gweek Sports Club.
